column17: The Skeleton Key unlocks the strongbox to reveal its contents.
The Shovel smashes the strongbox, risking the integrity of its contents.
The chest has already been rummaged.
You have curried favor from the gods!
The volumes are dull and uninteresting.
The text has a lasting impact on the hero.
The text is dark and unsettling.
The hero has destroyed knowledge and now must bear the guilt!
A few treasures are hidden in the iron maiden.
The iron maiden causes great harm to the hero.
Nothing is found amongst the remains.
The sight of the bones is unsettling to the hero.
The Holy Water cleans the bones and uncovers hidden tresures.
The pack has already been rummaged.
Some Gold was found in the sack.
The urn has nothing but ashes inside.
Treasures are found in the urn.
The ashes cause the hero to cough violently.
The hero becomes infected by the ashes.
The Holy Water cleanses the ashes, allowing a thorough search.
What type of person defiles the dead?
Treasures are stashed in the cabinet!
The hero's history of sin is too much to bear.
The hero is absolved of a sin.
Propitiations are found at the bottom of the fountain.
The volumes are dull and uninteresting.
The knowledge within forever changes the hero.
A map is found tucked into the volumes.
The experiments do not yield any findings.
An accident occurs during the experiment.
The medicinal herbs disinfected the station, allowing for successful research.
The oil helps create a powerful blazing mixture!
The bandage protects the hero's hands during the search.
There is nothing of value on the body.
The remains are laced with treasures.
The hero becomes diseased by the remains.
Bandaging the remains prevents infection during the search.
The shrine gives great insight into life in these warrens.
The hero is deeply disturbed by the shrine.
The offering purges the hero of a sinful behaviour.
Any power the altar once had is now lost.
The altar infuses the hero with great power.
The scrawlings are dull and uninteresting.
The scrawlings forever change the hero.
The rum barrel contains stashed treasures.
The hero becomes a slave of the sauce.
The Antivenom ensures the rum is not spiked.
The Skeleton Key opens the sarcophagus to reveal its contents.
The table contains leftovers from a previous dinner.
The rotting food makes the hero ill.
The herbs kill any diseases harboured in the food.
The scrolls are dull and uninteresting.
The scrolls forever change the hero.
The scrolls have a startling effect on the hero.
The scrolls reveal much of the road ahead.
The coffin gives the hero insight into the nature of this world.
There are treasures stashed in the bark.
The tree is covered in poisoned sap.
The Antivenom disinfects the tree, allowing for a thorough search.
The beast has nothing left to offer.
There is still some meat on these bones.
The hero is distraught by the sight of the carcass.
The Medicinal Herbs rid the carcass of any diseases.
Any power this fountain once had is now lost.
Nothing is left inside the tent.
Someone left valuables inside the tent.
The fate of the tent's occupant is found inside...
A map of the area is found inside the tent.
Treasures are hidden behind the web.
The hero is covered in a sticky goo.
The Bandages protect the hero's hands during the search.
The lock box is a trap!
Treasures are found inside the lockbox.
There is treasure hidden inside the grave.
Any power the altar once had is now lost.
The altar bestows a virtue on the hero.
The altar lashes out as it rejects the hero.
The altar radiates in reaction to the Holy Water.
The tablets are too difficult to read.
The tablets have a profound effect on the hero.
The hero carefully reads the tablets.
A map of the area reveals what is ahead.
The Medicinal Herbs strengthen the effect of the coral.
Someone left valuables inside the tent.
